question: No period since first and only depo shot?
question_content: I had the Depo shot a week after the birth of my baby. I was supposed to go back on Febuary 20th for my second shot but never did. I bled during the entire 3 months of my first and only depo shot. I haven't bled since. When should my period return? I took a pregnancy test around March 15th or so and it was negitive.

answers.answer_content: Depo takes a lot longer than other hormonal contraceptives to leave your system... sometimes up to 9-10 months after the last dose (aka, 6-7 months from now).  That doesn't mean that you can't become pregnant, so if your period doesn't start coming back you'll have to keep on taking the pregnancy tests periodically.

The same exact thing happened to me actually. I hate the depo shot, and will neve go on it again! 
I hated the bleeding and the spotting, couldn't stand it, so I never got my 2nd shot.
